channel.title: Infiltration Community Announcements
channel.description: Have a new Infiltration fan site, map or event you'd like to announce? This is the place. Here you can also find announcements directly from the Infilitration Team, the FAQ and other important documents

item.title: Infiltration's spiritual successor in development
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
It is called "Ground Branch" and requires fan funding on their Kickstarter page.

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/670743543/ground-branch


As a developer say, the main player versus player gamemode will be based on Infiltration's EAS principles, but also Terrorist Hunt, as known from the old Rainbow Six games, was confirmed.

Realism (proper weapon handling and movement) is a main focus.

Above all Beppo, the lead developer of Infiltration is associated with the...

Infiltration's spiritual successor in development

item.title: Let's Fail!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Darkslide)
item.dc:creator: Darkslide
item.content:encoded:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FxI7E-th03g
I do some Let's Plays of the USP missions, this is one of me failing in E'Nara Town.
If you have any suggestions on how to improve my videos or things that annoyed you tell me in this thread.
I'm pretty new to Infiltration. So yeah, hello y'all!

item.title: (69) INFMOD WeaponPack 1.61 Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (C.Inigo)
item.dc:creator: C.Inigo
item.content:encoded:
New pistol addition: FN Five-seveN USG edition.

Accessories included
-Muzzle Suppressor
-Flashlight/Laser Aim Module

Features of note
-Uses the same magazine as the old FN 5-7 pistol.
-Simulated flashlight/laser motion to match weapon bobbing; ie. ballistic path follows laser point.
-Combat Reloading: Pressing reload a 2nd time speeds up reloading, but must be timed at a specific point during the reload sequence. For the audio impaired, the visual cue...

(69) INFMOD WeaponPack 1.61 Update

item.title: INF Coop Plus
item.author: invalid@example.com (C.Inigo)
item.dc:creator: C.Inigo

item.title: INFMOD WeaponPack 1.6 Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (C.Inigo)
item.dc:creator: C.Inigo
item.content:encoded:
As requested, this update adds the M60, SCAR, AKS74U, BlackAKMSU, M4RO979, M3S90, C7, XM8, and DE50 weapon mutators to the weapon pack list, mainly for servers to free up some ServerPackages.

For the INF Community Edition, INFMOD_WeaponPack.u should be located in ..\Infiltration\Community\System. Place INFMOD_WeaponPack.int and .ini in UnrealTournament\System.

Remove these weapons from the active mutator list as they are now part of INFMOD Weapon Pack 1.6.
Remove these...

INFMOD WeaponPack 1.6 Update

item.title: Psytex Update!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
Either tomorrow, or in the next days the XploD servers will install a small update to the Psytex mod (camo related), including new 53 camos and probably a new face pack.

A download link for the update (~70MB) will be posted soon. If you happen to suddenly experience version mismatches, check the forum for the update.

Of course, Stinkmarder will update his servers too, but you never know when that happens.


Stay tuned!

item.title: New Infiltration Server 2.9 Full on Linux
item.author: invalid@example.com (-=V@STV$T=-)
item.dc:creator: -=V@STV$T=-
item.content:encoded:
Hi i just launched an Infiltration server 2.90 ,i was wondering if someone could make an download database for ftp and http access so we can put all Infiltration files, full installs win/linux ,mods,mutators etc all that u can find and place on it?i allready contacted ut-files.com and PlayTehGame.com to host Infiltration files ,i was also wondering why they stopped at 2.90 cause i think this mod stil kicks ass ,has an nice remote admin server, cool weapons etc ,so if anyone want to help...

New Infiltration Server 2.9 Full on Linux

item.title: Facebook

item.content:encoded:
Are any of you old Infiltrators on Facebook?

I'm not really a fan at all but it has its uses....such as keeping up with old friends. You can find me under the email gdghost1@gmail.com

item.title: Biene maja anniversary LAN

item.dc:creator: XploD
item.content:encoded:
Hi all.

Today, it's maja's (postponed) anniversary LAN and everyone is invited to join us on XploD.de TDM and COOP servers...

item.title: Playing times?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Assesina_Maja)
item.dc:creator: Assesina_Maja
item.content:encoded: I keep checking for people to play with and against but find no one on the servers. So I was wondering if the few remaining INF players could set up a schedule to make it easier for everyone to get together... just a thought.

item.title: Server_[FOOL] says goodbye!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Anonymous_[FOOL])
item.dc:creator: Anonymous_[FOOL]
item.content:encoded:
Sadly enough I have to inform you that we, the Family of Organized Losers (and Laggers), a.k.a. [FOOL], decided to cancel our Infiltration server. It has been tough to find platoon members willing to pay for the server this year, and impossible to find any for next year - as none of us really plays this game any more, this is understandable.

I do not know exactly yet when the server will go down, just wanted to give you a heads-up.

Best regards,
Anonymous

item.title: DTAS Game Night on SG Servers
item.author: invalid@example.com (shan)
item.dc:creator: shan
item.content:encoded:
Hi All,

After the success of the Infiltration gaming nights on Saturday and Sunday, I would like to invite you to join us for a night of DTAS gaming on the SG Servers DTAS Server this Sunday, April 20th. We'll start playing about 5PM Pacific Time (1AM Monday, April 21st GMT) and play until the servers empty out.

Some of us will also be on earlier, so feel free to join whenever.

I will do a post of the server config in the Online section. Please post there if you would like to see...

DTAS Game Night on SG Servers

item.title: Infiltration Game Night
item.author: invalid@example.com (shan)
item.dc:creator: shan
item.content:encoded:
Hi All,

I have a couple Infiltration 2.9 servers (TDM and DTAS) running. There are several of us planning to get on and play this weekend on Saturday night (4-12-2008). If you want to relive some of the old fun, feel free to join.

In case there are server browser issues, the servers are at:

TDM Server: 96.225.213.5:7777
DTAS Server: 96.225.213.5:7788

The Teamspeak server is at teamspeak.clanterritory.com:8767

Hope to see you all there.

Shan

item.title: New INF Coop forum
item.author: invalid@example.com (Stinkmarder)
item.dc:creator: Stinkmarder
item.content:encoded:
There is a new INF Coop forum:
http://infiltration.forum.cerberon.net/

In contrast to the BUF It runs on a server with a functional (and proven) backup concept.

item.title: Team.cat
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kitty.cat)
item.dc:creator: Kitty.cat
item.content:encoded:
Team.cat has a new site. Forums, guestbook, live chat, player profiles.

http://dotcat.bravehost.com

Currently, it's in the process of being built from the ground up, but there are some things on there already.

Feel free to stop by.


Edit: If you have a pop-up blocker, I hear from mat69 it's a good idea to turn it on.

item.title: New clan -[TAC]-
item.author: invalid@example.com (Clutch)
item.dc:creator: Clutch
item.content:encoded:
i've started a new clan. right now it consists of me and my brother (started it tonight). TAC stands for Tactical Assault Clan. i will be making a forum shortly so if you are interested you can join the forum and if you'd like, register for the clan and i'll see if i think you're good enough . there will be no server unless i can configure my router and crap to host one or have a member host one. i'll post info as i go.

i know, it seems pointless to make a clan when inf is as "popular"...

New clan -[TAC]-

item.title: n1 invites: public DTAS train on INFGermany
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nukeproof)
item.dc:creator: Nukeproof
item.content:encoded:
Every sunday 20.30 CET currently CEST we play DTAS for 2 hours. We like to invite everybody to join. Hop on INFGermany in time and hook on Team Speak: ts.infgermany.de We plan to keep a password for the server which will be provided via TS.

We usually rallied 6-8 mates in the recent past but we'd like to extend the event up to server capacity.

TS used to be mostly German but we'll be able to communicate in English (at least one teamchannel).

Training is not...

n1 invites: public DTAS train on INFGermany

--Harrm

item.title: Old skoolrz invite INF
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cow)
item.dc:creator: Cow
item.content:encoded:
Infiltration 2.65 for Unreal
TA will be hosting a night of old skool frag fest. This will be for all the old timers that have been around for 5+ years, so dust off those keyboards, oil those mice. We will be hosting on our server, and will also have a voice server set up. We will be trying to get a hold of the old maps and load them on the server, if anyone has one lying around with all the textures, you can send them to me at cow@cfl.rr.com and we will get them loaded. No...

Old skoolrz invite INF

item.title: DTASAL starting 3-13-05!
item.author: invalid@example.com (NTKB)
item.dc:creator: NTKB
item.content:encoded:
Thats right, the moment has arrived. The rules are set, the teams are chosen, the mercs are signed up, the map is ready and the tension is rising. This sunday, declarations will begin! If you havnt yet, sign up as a merc. Looking forward to all 70+ players signed up to have a great time!

Visit the DTASAL forums here!
